method.name: POST
method.doc: To configure the MMFA endpoint details, issue an HTTP POST command on the MMFA config resource URI.
Note: For the change to take effect, it must be deployed as described in the Configuration changes commit process.

request.doc: The recommended configuration includes the endpoints object rather than the hostname, port and junction configuration, which are maintained for backwards compatibility.

param.name: Authorization: Basic
param.doc: Basic authentication header.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

param.name: client_id
param.doc: The OAuth client ID required for the MMFA service.

param.name: hostname
param.doc: The hostname of the MMFA endpoint URI. Protocol used will be https. Must be configured if endpoints is not included.

param.name: port
param.doc: The port of the MMFA endpoint URI. Must be configured if endpoints is not included.

param.name: junction
param.doc: The junction of the MMFA endpoint URI. Must be configured if endpoints is not included.

param.name: options
param.doc: A list of configurable key-value pairs to be presented in the QR code. Recommended formatting "key=value,key=value".

param.name: endpoints
param.doc: An object containing the endpoints returned from the registration QR code or the discovery endpoint. If configured, overwrites hostname, port, and junction configuration.

param.name: discovery_mechanisms
param.doc: A list of authentication mechanism URIs to be included in the discovery endpoint response.

param.name: details_url
param.doc: The discovery endpoint included in the registration QR code.

param.name: enrollment_endpoint

param.name: hotp_shared_secret_endpoint

param.name: totp_shared_secret_endpoint
param.doc: The TOTP shared secret endpoint returned from the discovery endpoint.

param.name: qrlogin_endpoint
param.doc: The QR Code login endpoint returned from the discovery endpoint.

param.name: token_endpoint
param.doc: The OAuth token endpoint returned from the discovery endpoint.

param.name: authntrxn_endpoint
param.doc: The SCIM Transaction endpoint returned from the discovery endpoint.

param.name: mobile_endpoint_prefix
param.doc: The prefix of the runtime endpoint that is constructed and saved as the requestUrl of a transaction.
